meanings.sent1: I accidentally mistranscribed the phone number.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful not to mistranscribe the important information.
meanings.sent3: The robot mistook the 'mistranscribe' command for 'transcribe perfectly'.
meanings.sent4: Her memory tends to mistranscribe the details, turning them into fantastical tales.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's messy handwriting made it easy to mistranscribe the notes.

meanings.definition: To write or type down something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: He tends to mistranscribe names in his address book.
meanings.sent2: Make sure you don't mistranscribe any data from the survey.
meanings.sent3: The computer program kept mistranscribing the words, creating funny typos.
meanings.sent4: Her mind seemed to mistranscribe her thoughts onto the paper, jumbling them up.
meanings.sent5: The old typewriter often mistranscribed words due to its worn-out keys.
